001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.base;
002
003import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
004import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
005
006/**
007 * Represents a field in a table row that can be dynamically accessed and modified.
008 * This functional interface allows for invoking a setter method on a given instance
009 * to set a value for a specific table column.
010 *
011 * <p>Primarily used for reading, writing, and updating table data within
012 * the {@code Table} and {@code TableService} implementations.
013 *
014 * <p>The row model type is represented by {@code T}, which defines the structure of a table row.
015 * The type {@code P} represents the field type being set within the table row model.
016 *
017 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
018 */
019@FunctionalInterface
020public interface TableField<T> {
021
022   /**
023    * Creates a {@code TableField} from a given {@link BiConsumer}, which represents
024    * a setter method for a specific field.
025    *
026    * @param consumer The setter method reference.
027    * @param <T>      The type of the row model.
028    * @param <P>      The type of the field being set.
029    * @return A {@code TableField} instance.
030    */
031   static <T, P> TableField<T> of(BiConsumer<T, P> consumer) {
032      return (t, obj) -> consumer.accept(t, (P) obj);
033   }
034
035   /**
036    * Invokes the setter method for the corresponding field in the provided instance.
037    *
038    * @param instance The object instance on which to set the field value.
039    * @param o        The value to be set.
040    * @throws IllegalAccessException    If the method is not accessible.
041    * @throws InvocationTargetException If the method invocation fails.
042    */
043   void invoke(T instance, Object o) throws IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException;
044
045}
